recentProjects:
1) E-commerce Platform: Led development of a scalable e-commerce platform handling 100K+ daily users using React, Node.js, and PostgreSQL. Reduced page load time by 40%.

3) Microservices Migration: Architected and executed migration from monolith to microservices architecture, improving deployment frequency by 300%.

summary: Passionate software engineer with 5+ years of experience building scalable web applications. Specialized in full-stack development with expertise in React, Node.js, and cloud technologies. Strong problem-solver with a track record of delivering high-quality code in fast-paced environments.
coverLetter: I am excited to apply for this position as it aligns perfectly with my experience in building modern web applications. My background in full-stack development and proven track record of delivering scalable solutions makes me an ideal candidate for your team.
whyWorkHere: I am particularly drawn to your company's mission of using technology to solve real-world problems. Your commitment to innovation and collaborative culture aligns perfectly with my values. I'm excited about the opportunity to contribute to impactful projects while growing alongside a talented team.
